    Piece

    public class Queen
extends PieceImpl
implements Piece
    The queen combines the power of the rook and bishop and can move any number of squares along rank, file, or diagonal, but it may not leap over other pieces.

      • isValidMove

        public boolean isValidMove(Position oldPosition,
                           Position newPosition,
                           Piece isTaken,
                           Board board)
        Description copied from interface: Piece
        Check whether or not a given move on a given board is valid. For takes, the piece being taken must be supplied.
        Specified by:
        isValidMove in interface Piece
        Parameters:
        oldPosition - --- position of this piece before move.
        newPosition - --- position of this piece after move.
        isTaken - --- piece being taken, or null if no piece taken.
        board - --- board on which the validity of this move is being checked.
        Returns:
